info.title: Common Gateway
info.description: The Common Gateway is a further Dutch development of the European API Platform. API Platform is a project of Les Tilleus and, in itself, an extension of the Symfony framework. API Platform is a tool for delivering APIs based on standardized documentation and is used for various French and German government projects. Including Digital state, a precursor to Xroute, GOV.UK and Common Ground. The project is now part of joinup.eu (the European equivalent of Common Ground).
